byline.original: By CEYLAN YEGINSU and KARAM SHOUMALI
byline.contributor: Hwaida Saad and Anne Barnard contributed reporting from Beirut. Maher Samaan contributed reporting from Paris.

lead_paragraph: Most, including at least three children, were from the same extended family and were shot near the crossing at the town of Jisr al-Shoughour, Syrian activists and a monitoring group said.

headline.main: 11 Syrian Refugees Reported Killed by Turkish Border Guards

snippet: Most, including at least three children, were from the same extended family and were shot near the crossing at the town of Jisr al-Shoughour, Syrian activists and a monitoring group said.
